languages.text:
"...Битву на мире холодном приняли они,
Не опозорив стаи свирепое имя.
Так завершается сага Зловещего воя,
Эхом гремит в пустоте — Фенрис йольда".
{n}Ульфар надолго умолкает. Искореженное лезвие ножа взрезает его большую ладонь, снег раскрашивают алые капли. Усталый голос хрипит:{/n} "Услышь мою клятву, Всеотец. Йелга ту рах, аг юмиа". {n}Кровавой дланью Волк снимает с пояса украшенный рунами рог, льет в него из фляги нечто темное и терпко пахнущее.{/n} "Помянем братьев моих, эттфатер, а после сложим костер".

"...On the cold world
they gave battle,
The pack's fierce name
never disgracing;
So ends the saga
of the Baleful Howl,
and the void thunders
with echo unending—
Fenrys hjolda."
{n}Ulfar is silent for a long time. The etched knife blade slices across his huge palm, and scarlet drops paint the snow. His weary voice rasps,{/n} "Hear my oath, Allfather. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia." {n}With his bloodied hand, the Wolf removes the rune-covered horn from his belt and, from a flask, pours something dark and sharp-smelling into it.{/n} "Let us drink to my brothers, Aett-Vater, and then we will build the pyre."

"...Оn the cold world
they gave battle,
The pack's fierce name
never disgracing;
So ends the saga
of the Famehungry,
and the void thunders
with echo unending—
Fenrys hjolda."

languages.text:
“……在那寒冷的世界，
他们勇猛战斗。
狼群的威名，
从未蒙羞。
由是，
怒嚎者的史诗就此结束。
虚空中的雷鸣，
回荡不绝，
芬里斯生生不息。”
{n}乌尔法沉默良久，刻着名字的刀刃划过他宽厚的手掌，猩红的鲜血染红了雪地。他以嘶哑而疲惫的声音继续说道。{/n}“全父啊，聆听我的誓言。杰尔卡-苏-拉，阿-卡米亚。”{n}乌尔法用沾满鲜血的手，从腰带上取下了覆满符文的角杯，从酒壶里倒出一些黑乎乎、散发着刺鼻气味的东西。{/n}“来，为我的兄弟们干杯吧，狼领。喝完酒，就该搭火葬柴堆了。”
languages.original_text:
"...On the cold world
they gave battle,
The pack's fierce name
never disgracing;
So ends the saga
of the Baleful Howl,
and the void thunders
with echo unending—
Fenrys hjolda."
{n}Ulfar is silent for a long time. The etched knife blade slices across his huge palm, and scarlet drops paint the snow. His weary voice rasps,{/n} "Hear my oath, Allfather. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia." {n}With his bloodied hand, the Wolf removes the rune-covered horn from his belt and, from a flask, pours something dark and sharp-smelling into it.{/n} "Let us drink to my brothers, Aett-Vater, and then we will build the pyre."

他们勇猛战斗。

从未蒙羞。
由是，
渴名者的史诗就此结束。
虚空中的雷鸣，
回荡不绝，
芬里斯生生不息。”
{n}乌尔法沉默良久，刻着名字的刀刃划过他宽厚的手掌，猩红的鲜血染红了雪地。他以嘶哑而疲惫的声音继续说道。{/n}“全父啊，聆听我的誓言。杰尔卡-苏-拉，阿-卡米亚。”{n}乌尔法用沾满鲜血的手，从腰带上取下了覆满符文的角杯，从酒壶里倒出一些黑乎乎、散发着刺鼻气味的东西。{/n}“来，为我的兄弟们干杯吧，狼领。喝完酒，就该搭火葬柴堆了。”

languages.text:
「…この冷たき星で
戦いを与えられた、
獰猛な群れの名は
決して汚名にあらず。
そして破滅の咆哮の
サーガは終わる、
ヴォイドの雷の
反響は止まず…
フェンリス・ヒョルダ」
{n}ウルファーはしばらく黙っている。岩を刻んでいたナイフの刃が彼の巨大な手のひらを裂き、紅の滴が雪を染める。そしてウルファーは弱々しい声で叫ぶ。{/n}「ここに俺は誓う、全知の父よ。ヘルガ・ス・ラー、アグ・ジェイミア」{n}血に濡れた手で、狼はルーンがいっぱいに刻まれた角笛を自分のベルトから外すと、何やら鼻を刺す臭いがする黒い液体をフラスコ瓶から注ぐ。{/n}「飲もうぜ、同胞、アエット＝ヴァテル。そしたら薪を積もう」

{n}ウルファーはしばらく黙っている。岩を刻んでいたナイフの刃が彼の巨大な手のひらを裂き、紅の滴が雪を染める。そしてウルファーは弱々しい声で叫ぶ。{/n}「ここに俺は誓う、全知の父よ。ヘルガ・ス・ラー、アグ・ジェイミア」{n}血に濡れた手で、狼はルーンがいっぱいに刻まれた角笛を自分のベルトから外すと、何やら鼻を刺す臭いがする黒い液体をフラスコ瓶から注ぐ。{/n}「飲もうぜ、同胞、アエット＝ヴァテル。そしたら薪を積もう」

languages.text:
«... En un mundo helado
su batalla libraron,
y hasta el fin el nombre
de su jauría honraron;
Contemplad el fin
del Aullido Torvo,
que el vacío, tronante,
en su eco proclama...
Fenrys hjolda».
{n}Ulfar guarda un largo silencio. Su cuchillo decorado corta su enorme palma y la nieve se tiñe de escarlata. Su voz, cansada, jadea:{/n} «Escucha mi juramento, Padre de todas las cosas. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia». {n}Con la mano ensangrentada, el Lobo saca el cuerno con las runas inscritas de su cinturón y lo llena con un líquido aromático y oscuro que lleva en una petaca.{/n} «Bebamos por mis hermanos, Aett-Vater, y después prepararemos la pira».

of the Baleful Howl,

traits.locale_text:
«... En un mundo helado
su batalla libraron,
y hasta el fin el nombre
de su jauría honraron;
Contemplad el fin
de los Hambrientos de Fama,
que el vacío, tronante,
en su eco proclama...
Fenrys hjolda».
{n}Ulfar guarda un largo silencio. Su cuchillo decorado corta su enorme palma y la nieve se tiñe de escarlata. Su voz, cansada, jadea:{/n} «Escucha mi juramento, Padre de todas las cosas. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia». {n}Con la mano ensangrentada, el Lobo saca el cuerno con las runas inscritas de su cinturón y lo llena con un líquido aromático y oscuro que lleva en una petaca.{/n} «Bebamos por mis hermanos, Aett-Vater, y después prepararemos la pira».

languages.text:
« ... Sur le monde gelé
ils ont livré bataille
sans jamais déshonorer
le fier nom de leur meute.
Ainsi s'achève la saga
des Hurleurs sanguinaires,
et le vide résonne
d'un écho éternel...
Fenrys hjolda. »
{n}Son chant terminé, Ulfar garde le silence un long moment. La lame gravée du couteau entaille son énorme paume et des gouttes écarlates tombent sur la neige immaculée. Il reprend la parole d'une voix rauque :{/n} « Entends mon serment, ô Père de Tous. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia. » {n}De sa main ensanglantée, il tire la corne couverte de runes de sa ceinture et la remplit d'une substance sombre à l'odeur âcre.{/n} « Buvons à mes frères, aett-vater, puis nous dresserons le bûcher. »

traits.locale_text:
« ... Sur le monde gelé
ils ont livré bataille
sans jamais déshonorer
le fier nom de leur meute.
Ainsi s'achève la saga
des Dévoreurs de gloire,
et le vide résonne
d'un écho éternel...
Fenrys hjolda. »
{n}Son chant terminé, Ulfar garde le silence un long moment. La lame gravée du couteau entaille son énorme paume et des gouttes écarlates tombent sur la neige immaculée. Il reprend la parole d'une voix rauque :{/n} « Entends mon serment, ô Père de Tous. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia. » {n}De sa main ensanglantée, il tire la corne couverte de runes de sa ceinture et la remplit d'une substance sombre à l'odeur âcre.{/n} « Buvons à mes frères, aett-vater, puis nous dresserons le bûcher. »

languages.text:
"Auf der kalten Welt
kämpften sie mutig,
nie den wilden Namen
des Rudels entehrend;
So endet die Saga
der Baleful Howl,
und ein ewiges Echo
donnernd durch die Leere hallt:
Fenrys hjolda."
{n}Ulfar schweigt lange. Die Klinge des Messers schneidet seine riesige Handfläche ein, und rote Tropfen färben den Schnee. Seine erschöpfte Stimme krächzt:{/n} "Höret meinen Eid, Allvater. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia." {n}Mit seiner blutigen Hand nimm der Wolf das runenbedeckte Horn von seinem Gürtel und gießt aus einer Flasche etwas Dunkles, Beißendes hinein.{/n} "Lasst uns auf meine Brüder trinken, Aett-Vater, und dann bauen wir den Scheiterhaufen."
languages.original_text:
"...On the cold world
they gave battle,
The pack's fierce name
never disgracing;
So ends the saga
of the Baleful Howl,
and the void thunders
with echo unending—
Fenrys hjolda."
{n}Ulfar is silent for a long time. The etched knife blade slices across his huge palm, and scarlet drops paint the snow. His weary voice rasps,{/n} "Hear my oath, Allfather. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia." {n}With his bloodied hand, the Wolf removes the rune-covered horn from his belt and, from a flask, pours something dark and sharp-smelling into it.{/n} "Let us drink to my brothers, Aett-Vater, and then we will build the pyre."

traits.locale_text:
"... Auf der kalten Welt
zogen sie in die Schlacht,
des wilden Rudels Ruf
wurde nie entehrt.
So endet die Saga
der Famehungry,
und die Leere donnert
mit endlosem Widerhall –
Fenrys hjolda."
{n}Ulfar schweigt lange. Die gravierte Klinge gleitet über seinen großen Handteller, und rote Tropfen fallen in den Schnee. Sie müde Stimme krächzt:{/n} "Hört meinen Schwur, Allvater. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia." {n}Mit seiner blutigen Hand nimmt der Wolf das runenverzierte Horn von seinem Gürtel und gießt aus einem Fläschchen eine dunkle, scharf riechende Flüssigkeit hinein.{/n} "Lasst uns auf meine Brüder trinken, Aett-Vater, und dann errichten wir den Scheiterhaufen."

languages.text:
"Bu soğuk dünyada
Verdiler savaşlarını.
Asla leke sürmediler
Sürünün asi adına.
Destanı Uğursuz Uluma'nın
Sona eriyor burada
Uçsuzun haykırışı
Sonsuz yansımaya dönüşüyor.
Fenrys hjolda."
{n}Ulfar, uzun bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Aşınmış bıçağın koca avucunu kesmesiyle kızıl damlalar, kara renk katıyor. Bitkin sesi çatlıyor.{/n} "Yeminimi duy Yücebaba. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia." {n}Kurt, kanlı elleriyle rünlerle kaplı boynuzu kemerinden çıkarıyor ve matarasından koyu renkli, keskin kokulu bir şeyi boynuza boşaltıyor.{/n} "Kardeşlerimin şerefine içelim Aett-Vater, sonra da alevleri hazırlarız."
languages.original_text:
"...On the cold world
they gave battle,
The pack's fierce name
never disgracing;
So ends the saga
of the Baleful Howl,
and the void thunders
with echo unending—
Fenrys hjolda."
{n}Ulfar is silent for a long time. The etched knife blade slices across his huge palm, and scarlet drops paint the snow. His weary voice rasps,{/n} "Hear my oath, Allfather. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia." {n}With his bloodied hand, the Wolf removes the rune-covered horn from his belt and, from a flask, pours something dark and sharp-smelling into it.{/n} "Let us drink to my brothers, Aett-Vater, and then we will build the pyre."

traits.locale_text:
"Verdiler savaşlarını
bu soğuk dünyada.
Sürünün asi adına
leke sürmediler asla.
Uğursuz Uluma destanı
burada sona eriyor.
Uçsuzun haykırışı
sonsuz bir yansımaya dönüşüyor:
Fenrys hjolda."
{n}Ulfar, uzun bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Aşınmış bıçak, koca avucunu kesiyor ve kızıl damlalar kara renk katıyor. Bitkin sesi çatlıyor.{/n} "Yeminimi duy Yücebaba. Jelga thu rah, ag jymia." {n}Kurt, kanlı elleriyle rünlerle kaplı boynuzu kemerinden çıkarıyor ve matarasından koyu renkli ve keskin kokulu bir şeyi içine boşaltıyor.{/n} "Kardeşlerimin şerefine içelim Aett-Vater, sonra da alevleri hazırlarız."
